about_the_game:
This set contains items that allow you to change Van's in-game outfit to the Mishy Suit, and the system voice of the tactical orbment Xipha to that of R.A. Monitoring Target (VA: ???).

-Mishy Suit: Van
-HOLOW CORE VOICE: R.A. Monitoring Target

*Open [DLC] under the [Item] page in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*After unlocking costumes, apply them via [EQUIP] -> [Costumes] in the main menu.
*After unlocking items, apply them via [Modify Orbment] in the Orbment Workshop menu.
